name: King goblin's party
description:
You are playing a little King Goblin who try to charge a castle but you will need to make alliance with people to succed. You will need to convince peoples with your incredible dance move.

Controls : 

Directional arrow of the keyboard.

This game was made with Unity during the E-art jam in 48 Hours by a group of 5 people :

Valentin HERNANDEZ : Developer, Game designer

Félix BERGERON : Sound designer, Developer

Loeïs POMPOM : Environment Artist

Nils : Developer

Noam AITOUCHIKH : UI / Character Artist
